thread.title: Jamiroquai’s “Cloud 9” Video Stars Penélope Cruz’s Sister
thread.title_full: Jamiroquai’s “Cloud 9” Video Stars Penélope Cruz’s Sister

author: Jacob Davey
title: Jamiroquai’s “Cloud 9” Video Stars Penélope Cruz’s Sister
text:
Jamiroquai has released the video for “Cloud 9,” the lead single from the band’s grand return on upcoming new album Automaton .
Featuring Penelope Cruz’s sister, Monica, the video features the model pulling off her best moves with Jay Kay – who is somehow pulling off a fedora and bootcuts – before driving off in vintage cars down a picturesque stretch of highway into the night.
The track has all the hallmarks of Jamiroquai’s futuristic, funk-driven sound. Speaking about the track, Jay Kay said, “Cloud 9 is a song that’s written in the style that I hope people know us for and are familiar with. It’s a song that if anyone that has been jilted and yet found love somewhere else will no doubt relate to. Can’t wait for you to hear it – get in the car stick it on the radio and just drive.”
Automaton is due out on March 31. You can watch the video for the title track below.

In other music news, you can can listen to Kodak Black’s poignant new track, “My Time’, here .
